912120.name: Saturnine
912120.description:
Saturnine - a horror survival adventure.

In Saturnine you will explore abandoned villages and the woods of Nearna. Find clues about the absence of all human life and collect diary entries to learn about the story.
But beware: Nightfall comes closer and something mystifying and evil is awaiting you in the shadows of the darkness!

Will you survive the night?

Saturnine is a 3D game with 1st person perspective, but is played like a point and click adventure. A single click on the terrain will let you walk in this direction. Hold the mouse button down to look around. Click on objects to collect them.

To get the best scary and shocking effect, play Saturnine alone at night in a dark room.

If you like jumpscare effects and slenderman, Saturnine is the game for you.

INFO

Most players seem to play the game only about 5 minutes. This is a sad sign of our short life cycle society behaviour. The actual excitement starts around 8 minutes. Be sure to take your time!
912120.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
